text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @EsperDoD @SecPompeo Without masks, without social distance or any other prevention. These whants to be examples and rescue the nation...!?
#COVIDIOTS #coronavirus #COVID19 #10mai #MothersDay
